title: The Magnificent seven (Captioned)

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Machismo
description: In a stroke of filmmaking inspiration, director John Sturges saw the possibility of transposing Akira Kurosawa's film classic "The Seven Samurai", from feudal Japan to the American West and it worked brilliantly. Yul Brynner stars as the leader of a group of skilled gunfighters hired to protect a poor Mexican village from marauding bandits led by the vicious Calvera, played with ruthless delight by Eli Wallach. Fighting alongside Brynner and Steve McQueen are Charles Bronson, James Coburn and Robert Vaughn, whose film careers were launched by this film. With a now-classic musical score and stunning cinematography, "the Magnificent Seven" provides exciting entertainment as well as touching on the themes of dignity, honour, courage and survival. The film established a new standard for future generations of Westerns.
